body:
It's a little vote.
Say which games have the best soundtracks.
My vote goes on Castle Crashers but I wont add it.
Infamous: 1
Final Fantasy: 2
Super Smash Bros: 1
Super Mario Galaxy: 1
Pokemon: 1

title: Best Game Soundtracks

replies.body: I luvvvvvvv Castle Crashers but I also like Infamous it sounds wierd but I like it
